columns.County_ID: A unique identifier for each county in the public safety database.
columns.Name: The name of the county.
columns.Population: The total number of people living in the county.
columns.Police_officers: The total number of police officers available in the county.
columns.Residents_per_officer: The average number of residents served by each police officer in the county.
columns.Case_burden: The average number of cases or incidents handled by police officers in the county.
columns.Crime_rate: The incidence of crimes reported per 100,000 residents in the county.
columns.Police_force: The name of the police department or force serving the county.
columns.Location: The geographic orientation or area designation of the county.

county_public_safety.table_description: The county_public_safety table contains information regarding public safety metrics across various counties, including details on population, police resources, crime statistics, and the associated law enforcement agencies.

columns.City_ID: A unique identifier for each city within the database.
columns.County_ID: An identifier linking the city to its corresponding county.
columns.Name: The name of the city.
columns.White: The percentage of the population identifying as White.
columns.Black: The percentage of the population identifying as Black.
columns.Amerindian: The percentage of the population identifying as Amerindian.
columns.Asian: The percentage of the population identifying as Asian.
columns.Multiracial: The percentage of the population identifying as Multiracial.
columns.Hispanic: The percentage of the population identifying as Hispanic.

city.table_description: The city table contains demographic information for cities, detailing population composition by ethnicity and linking each city to its respective county.
